stem.question: I aim to design and build sustainable infrastructure as a Civil Engineer.

My goal is to manage information systems for organizations and businesses.
I want to innovate in programming, algorithms, and computing as a Computer Scientist.

My goal is to start and grow my own successful business as an Entrepreneur.

gas.question: I aim to become a Psychologist who helps people understand and improve their mental health.
